Elect SC¶

contract Elect is usingProvable¶
Title

A smart contract to elect a profile based on a set of objective criteria, and a QoS.

event BestCandidates(string ExistCandidates, string profiles)¶
¶

Answers to a service request by providing the oracle output.

Parameters

  • ExistCandidates – Note to the user: whether a matching candidate has been retrieved.

  • profiles – If success, this variables holds the profile details of the best candidates.

¶
Notice

Scans each profile of the candidates matrix to find matching resources.

Parameters

  • attributes – The binary array of required attributes (set of filtering criteria)

  • availability – The availability date required (also a filtering criteria)

Return

binary array of matching candidates

function __callback(bytes32 myid, string memory result)¶
public
¶

This function is triggered by the oracle.

Notice

Callback function. Emits to the user the best profiles retrieved based on the QoS computation.

Parameters

  • myid – The binary array of required attributes (set of filtering criteria)

  • result – best profiles retrieved by the oracle.

function sort(uint256[] memory attributes, uint256[] memory availability, string memory alphas, uint256 num_alphas)¶
public
payable
¶
Notice

Main function: Scans each profile of the candidates matrix to find matching resources. If a match exists, ask the oracle for a QoS sorting.

Parameters

  • attributes – The binary array of required attributes (set of filtering criteria)

  • availability – The availability date required (also a filtering criteria)

  • alphas – The weighing optimization values (string concatenation to reduce compuation costs (format required for the API call))

  • num_alphas – The number of weighing optimization factors (not computed in the SC to limit computation costs).

Return

binary array of matching candidates

public
payable
¶

Adds a new agreement to the list and emit a success event.

Parameters

  • _ppl – the contractor and resource BC address

  • _issuanceDate – date of issuance of the contract

  • _shipInfo – shipment information

  • _nature – nature of the items to deliver

  • _details – merchandise details (quantity,gross weight and volume)

function seeAggreement(uint256 i, address sender)¶

view

¶

Checks for the identity of the requester, and display the requested aggreement if the identity matches with the contractor or service provider.

Parameters

  • sender – BC address of the requester

Return

the agreement details if the identity of the requester is correct, a fake agreement otherwise.
